name: Jane Doe
bio: With over 10 years of experience, Jane specializes in building confidence in new and young riders. Her patient and encouraging approach makes learning to ride a fun and rewarding experience.

name: John Smith
bio: John is a certified therapeutic riding instructor who is passionate about the healing power of horses. He works closely with individuals to achieve their personal growth and wellness goals.

name: Emily Jones
bio: Emily is a competitive rider with a focus on dressage and show jumping. She helps experienced riders refine their technique and prepare for competitions.

name: Michael Brown
bio: Michael has a deep connection with nature and horses. He teaches natural horsemanship techniques and leads guided trail rides through Keney Park, focusing on building a partnership between horse and rider.

name: Sarah Davis
bio: Sarah is a classically trained dressage rider with a gift for teaching the finer points of rhythm, relaxation, and connection. She brings a calm and focused energy to every lesson.

name: David Martinez
bio: A former Grand Prix competitor, David's passion is helping riders and horses soar to new heights. He focuses on building confidence and strong fundamentals for the jumping arena.

name: Jessica Chen
bio: Jessica makes learning about horses fun and engaging for the youngest riders. She heads the Pony Club program, teaching horsemanship, responsibility, and teamwork.
